author: smuzaffar
body: There are some extra characters in comments which confuses clang-format and clang-format keeps on suggesting changes. https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/3f1e190d840203f218aaf98251d32d00e4e4d339 fixes these and on  top we applied the `scram code-format`
title: Code format avoid recursive formatting
